SENT.plain: Brain abscess is a rare but very dangerous neurosurgical lesion
Prompt diagnosis and emergency surgical evacuation are the hallmarks of therapy
Brain abscess following ischemic and hemorrhagic stroke is a rare entity
These cases are often preceded by episodes of bacteremia, sepsis, and local infection
The authors report the case of a 30-year-old woman who presented with a cerebral abscess at the site of a recent intraparenchymal hemorrhage
